marklogic.body: I haven't read the book, but am interested to do so. I can say, as an atheist, that I have absolutely ZERO interest in developing rituals to take part in with other atheists. In fact, the very idea is kind of disgusting to me. Â Some people might crave rituals, and there are plenty of places they can scratch that Itch. But the idea of rituals for atheists comes Off as a simple substitute for religion. A lot of people have absolutely zero interest in that.Â
